name: No Time For Love: Ludum Dare 51
name_original: No Time For Love: Ludum Dare 51
description:
## Controls

* Left click to pick navigate the UI, pick up reactions, and place them on what NPCs have to say.

* DESKTOP VERSION: q/esc to exit the application when no quit button is available.

## Overview

Play as someone looking for love in a world where speed dating is all too literal. You have 10 seconds to react to what NPCs have to say in order to win them over or scare them off for good.

Don't be overwhelmed though! You're not expected to be able to understand everything people have to say in one go. Just do you best, have fun, and try again! 

See if you can get an ending where everyone wants to date you, or for an extra challenge, try for an ending where almost everyone hates your guts!

We hope you find it overwhelming, hectic, and most importantly fun!

Submission for Ludum Dare 51. Theme: Every 10 Seconds

## Credits

Art - Sera @dippitydoop

Audio - Axel @AxelDoesMusic

Programming - David @MeAmDavidPierce

Writing - Darian @darianjshump
